data.prayer: Jesus, 100 people live in the state of Dzaoudzi. Please, give them 2 new simple churches this year.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dzaoudzi, Mayotte
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Dzaoudzi, Mayotte.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Dzaoudzi, Mayotte today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Dzaoudzi.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Dzaoudzi.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Dzaoudzi, Mayotte to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Dzaoudzi, Mayotte to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary:
the state of Dzaoudzi, Mayotte has a population of 100.

We estimate Dzaoudzi has 0 people who might know Jesus, 2 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 98 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 100 neighbors who need Jesus.
